question: Bring out the ONLY incorrect statement:
option1: In Kesavanand Bharti Case, Supreme Court held that Preamble is part of Indiaâ€™s Constitution
option2: Article 34 covers the imposing of Martial Law
option3: Ideal of Justice in Indian Constitution comes from the Russian (erstwhile USSR) Constitution
option4: January 26, 1950 marks the final session of the Constituent Assembly
answer: January 26, 1950 marks the final session of the Constituent Assembly
explanation: The first Constituent Assembly of India met for the first time in New Delhi on 9 December 1946, and its last session was held on 24 January 1950.
